cyclone.name: BONNIE
cyclone.current_location: about 355 miles SE of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest tonight, then turning northwest and north toward the South Carolina coast this weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina coast in the vicinity of Charleston/Savannah River area

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: No watches posted for Florida; watch area begins north of Savannah River.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Savannah River GA to Little River Inlet SC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia and Carolinas coasts (Savannah River northward through coastal North Carolina)
weather_observation.wind: Only a slight (â‰¤3%) chance of brief tropical-storm-force gusts; sustained gales not expected.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Palm Beach coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated showers from distant outer bands; heavy tropical rains to remain well north of the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along southeast Florida beaches.
